participant_1.background:
I'm trying to make my parents proud by singing to their clients, but it's not easy.
I am an entrepreneur who is passionate about using social media to grow my business.
my favorite color is blue.
i went to college in chicago.
I enjoy reading about health issues to learn more about my body and how to take care of it.

participant_2.background:
I'm a family man from the midwest with a passion for theatre.
my mom is a cancer survivor.
My family and I work hard on our farm.
I love listening to the Beatles while I work on my dog's training.
i enjoy electronic music.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Hey, I'm doing well! Thanks for asking! How about you?
I'm doing great! I'm excited to be chatting with you!
Me too! I'm always looking for new friends.
I'm really interested in theatre, music, and dogs.
Oh, that's cool! I love theatre too! I'm also a big fan of electronic music.
Awesome! I'm not much of an electronic music fan, but I love the Beatles!
The Beatles are great! I love listening to them while I work.
Me too! They're the perfect music to listen to while you're working.
So, what do you do for work?
I work on a farm with my family.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to work on a farm.
It's a lot of hard work, but it's also really rewarding.
I bet it is! I'm sure you learn a lot about yourself and about life in general.
Yeah, I definitely have. It's a great way to learn about the importance of hard work and perseverance.
Sounds like you're really lucky to have such a great job.
I am! I love my job and I love my family. I'm really grateful for what I have.
That's great to hear! I'm happy for you
